headline: Assessing STERIS (STE) Valuation After Recent Share Price Gains And Strong Long Term Returns
summary: Why STERIS Is On Watch For Investors Now STERIS (STE) has attracted attention after recent share price moves, with the stock showing a 4.7% gain over the past month and a 7.6% rise over the past 3 months. See our latest analysis for STERIS. STERS's recent share price gain over the past quarter comes after a softer past week, while a 1 year total shareholder return of 20.46% and 5 year total shareholder return of 49.97% point to steadier progress for long term holders.
